hero.title: Welcome to Our Store
hero.subtitle: This is our initial website launch! We're excited to share our products and services with you. Below you'll find QR codes that you can scan with your phone to view our detailed catalogs and information.

qrSection.title: Scan to View Our Documents
qrSection.subtitle: Use your smartphone camera to scan these QR codes and instantly access our product information

qrCard.step4: • Or use a QR scanner app

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery

qualityProducts.title: Quality Products

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?

contact.title: Contact Us

tooltips.vatTooltip: Value Added Tax identification number for EU transactions
tooltips.sirenTooltip: SIREN: Company Registration Number - Unique 9-digit identifier for the business entity
tooltips.siretTooltip: SIRET: Establishment ID - 14-digit number identifying this specific business location
